name: Coronattack
description:
Here is a little prototype of a game using only one button we as students in Game Design had to make in a week. I don't plan on upgrading  this game (maybe not yet), i'm just placing it here so people can see  and play what i've made during my studies as a Game Designer. The game is just like an arcade game, you have a score and you'll have to move  up or down to dodge the pandemic of Coronavirus !

(PS : the up and down key are Z and S because my keyboard is french so it's normal if it's not W and S)
